1040.name: Obsidian Edge
1040.description:
• Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them over time.
  • Auto Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Attack-Smite, increasing its damage to monsters.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen mana when in the Jungle or River.

    Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

1043.name: Recurve Bow
1043.description:
15% Attack Speed

Attacks apply bonus magic damage On-Hit.

1054.name: Doran's Shield
1054.description:
110 Health

Enduring Focus
  • Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Regenerate 4 Health every 5 seconds. After taking damage from a champion, large or epic jungle monster, restores up to 45 Health over 8 seconds. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

1056.name: Doran's Ring
1056.description:
18 Ability Power
90 Health

Restoration
  • Restore Mana every second. If you can't gain Mana, regenerate Health instead.
  • Attacks deal additional damage to minions.

1082.name: Dark Seal
1082.description:
15 Ability Power
50 Health

Glory
Kills and Assists grant stacks, gain Ability Power per stack. Lose some stacks on death.

1083.name: Cull
1083.description:
7 Attack Damage

Reap
  • Restore 3 Health per hit.
  • Killing a lane minion grants 1 additional gold, up to 100. Killing 100 lane minions grants an additional 350 bonus gold.

1101.name: Scorchclaw Pup
1101.description:
• Jungle Companions: Summon an Scorchclaw to assist you in the jungle.
  • Scorchclaw's Slash: When fully grown your companion periodically imbues your next damaging effect to Slow and damage enemy champions.

1102.name: Gustwalker Hatchling
1102.description:
• Jungle Companions: Summon a Gustwalker to assist you while in the jungle.
  • Gustwalker's Gait: When fully grown your companion grants Move Speed after entering brush or killing monsters.

1103.name: Mosstomper Seedling
1103.description:
• Jungle Companions: Summon a Mosstomper to assist you while in the jungle.
  • Mosstomper's Courage: When fully grown your companion grants a permanent shield that regenerates either after killing monsters or out of combat. While the shield holds gain 0% Tenacity and Slow Resist.

1502.name: Reinforced Armor
1502.description: Reinforced: Reduces incoming damage by 66.66% and becomes immune to True Damage when no enemy minions are nearby.

1506.name: Reinforced Armor
1506.description:
Reinforced: Reduces incoming damage by 66% and becomes immune to True Damage when no enemy minions are nearby.
Regeneration: Base turrets have health regeneration, but cannot regenerate past their current segment. Base turrets are segmented at 33%, 66% and 100% health.

2003.name: Health Potion
2003.description:
Active - Consume: Drink the potion to restore 120 Health over 15 seconds.

You may carry up to 5 Health Potions.

2010.name: Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will
2010.description: Active - Consume: Eat the biscuit to restore 8% missing Health and Mana over 5 seconds. Consuming or selling a biscuit permanently grants 40 maximum Mana.

2015.name: Kircheis Shard
2015.description:
15 Attack Damage

Jolt
Energized Attacks deal an additional 60 magic damage.

2031.name: Refillable Potion
2031.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 100 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

2033.name: Corrupting Potion
2033.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 100 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

2051.name: Guardian's Horn
2051.description:
150 Health


  • Recovery: Restores Health over time.
  • Undaunted: Blocks damage from attacks and spells from champions.
  • Legendary: This item counts as a Legendary item.

2052.name: Poro-Snax
2052.description:
This savory blend of free-range, grass-fed Avarosan game hens and organic, non-ZMO Freljordian herbs contains the essential nutrients necessary to keep your Poro purring with pleasure.

All proceeds will be donated towards fighting Noxian animal cruelty. Active - Consume: Serves a scrumptious scoop to a nearby Poro, causing it to grow in size.

2055.name: Control Ward
2055.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

2065.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
2065.description:
55 Ability Power
15 Ability Haste
8% Move Speed
125% Base Mana Regen



ACTIVE (0s)
Inspiring Speech
Grants nearby allies Move Speed.

2138.name: Elixir of Iron
2138.description:
Active - Consume: Drink to gain 300 Health, 25% Tenacity, and increased champion size for 3 minutes. While active, moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champions' Move Speed by 15%.

Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.

2139.name: Elixir of Sorcery
2139.description: Champion level 9 or greater required to purchase. Elixir of Sorcery's true damage effect has no cooldown when attacking turrets. Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.Active - Consume: Drink to gain 50 Ability Power and 15% Mana Regen for 3 minutes. While active, damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus true damage (5s cooldown).

2140.name: Elixir of Wrath
2140.description:
Active - Consume: Drink to gain 30 Attack Damage and 12% Physical Vamp (against champions) for 3 minutes.

Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.

2150.name: Elixir of Skill
2150.description:
Active - Consume: Grants 1 Skill Point.

This item does not increase your level or allow allocating skill points past the normal maximum in a skill

2151.name: Elixir of Avarice
2151.description: Active - Consume: Drink to gain 5 true damage on hit against minions for 60 seconds. When this effect expires, gain 40 gold.

2152.name: Elixir of Force
2152.description: Active - Consume: Drink to gain 20 Adaptive Force for 60 seconds.

2419.name: Commencing Stopwatch
2419.description:
• Transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Takedowns reduce this timer by 2 minutes. That Stopwatch contributes 250 gold to the items it builds into.

    Stopwatch normally contributes 750 gold

2420.name: Seeker's Armguard
2420.description:
45 Ability Power
25 Armor

ACTIVE
Time Stop (Single use)
Enter Stasis for 2.5 seconds.

2421.name: Shattered Armguard
2421.description:
45 Ability Power
25 Armor

Shattered Time
Armguard is broken, but can still be upgraded.

After breaking one Armguard, the shopkeeper will only sell you Shattered Armguard.

2422.name: Slightly Magical Footwear
2422.description:
25 Move Speed


  • Grants an additional 10 Move Speed. Boots that build from Slightly Magical Footwear retain this bonus Move Speed.

2423.name: Perfectly Timed Stopwatch
2423.description:
45 Ability Power
25 Armor

ACTIVE

Enter Stasis for 2.5 seconds.

400 Health

Anguish

200 Health
40 Armor
5% Move Speed

Lead the Way

80 Ability Power
600 Mana

Awe

Manaflow

35 Attack Damage
500 Mana
15 Ability Haste

Awe

Manaflow

3009.name: Boots of Swiftness

60 Move Speed

10% Heal and Shield Power
75% Base Mana Regen

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

80 Ability Power
1000 Mana

Awe Gain Ability Power equal to 2% bonus Mana.
Lifeline (90(0s))

3041.name: Mejai's Soulstealer

20 Ability Power
100 Health

Glory

200 Health

Rage

10% Move Speed

Spellblade

3068.description:
450 Health
50 Armor


  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (12 + 1.75% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions) for 3 seconds. Damaging Champions or Epic Monsters with this effect adds a stack, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10% for 5 seconds (max stacks 6).

3070.name: Tear of the Goddess
3070.description:
240 Mana


  • Focus: Attacks deal additional physical damage to Minions.
  • Manaflow: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

3071.name: Black Cleaver
3071.description:
55 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste

Carve

Fervor

3072.name: Bloodthirster

20% Critical Strike Chance

Engorge

3073.name: Experimental Hexplate

Hexcharged

Overdrive

3074.name: Ravenous Hydra

ACTIVE (0s)

3084.name: Heartsteel

900 Health
200% Base Health Regen

Colossal Consumption (0s) per target

Goliath

3085.name: Runaan's Hurricane
3085.description:
40% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed

Peck

Wind's Fury
